attributes.action: make television advertisements which promote inappropriate behavior illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These days there are much too many adverts broadcasted on daytime television which show inappropriate pictures or promote inappropriate behavior to younger children, whether it be antisocial or sexual. If the government controls the films we see, should they not control the things broadcasted on television as well? We think they should and we are sure you agree.
